A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where do I begin?  The writing is so fundamentally flawed\, so self-defeating\, so poorly structured...  The complications are overly contrived\, the fictitious battle tactics are stupid to the point of laughable...  And it takes nearly an hour and a half to get going\, resulting in an unnecessarily long movie that feels about three times longer than its 2 1/2 hour runtime.  A galaxy of build-up and potential totally squandered out of laziness and disrespect for the audience\, leaving Episode IX with the seemingly impossible challenge of not only wrapping \"the Skywalker Saga\" in any kind of meaningful way but of making us even care anymore.
